thread.title: Janessa
thread.title_full: R&G Brenner Income Tax reviewed by Janessa

author: Janessa
title: Janessa
text: I've been using R&G Brenner for the past 13 years, before that my mom would use them and bring me with her... Dan Shapiro has never, ever steered me wrong. The one year I wound up with someone else, they hadn't either. They're thorough, knowledgeable and really truly care about those who go there. I have recommended them millions of times before and I'll continue to!
